attributes.action: Petitions Should Incorporate "Agree" or "Disagree" Ensuring Fair Balanced View.
attributes.additional_details:
For example 1.9 million people wanted to prevent Trump from UK State Visits but we have no idea how many would have welcomed him?  

6 Million People signed to say "Revoke Article 50" but a single petition showing the polar opposite is unavailable so we have no idea how many people have the opposing view (all others have specific details making them significantly different)
attributes.background: Petitions on the UK Government & Parliament site provide a one-sided view of any topic making them uneven. Incorporating an "Agree" or "Disagree" function would provide the fair & balanced view that is so often needed.
